TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void AuthenticateEventHandler(object sender, AuthenticateEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed AuthenticateEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub AuthenticateEventHandler(sender As Object, e As AuthenticateEventArgs)
public delegate void AuthenticateEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, AuthenticateEventArgs ^ e);

param.name: e
param.span: An that contains the event data.

span.span: An that contains the event data.

summary.span: Represents the method that will handle the event of a control.

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the event of a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks При создании делегата определяется метод обработки события.When you create an delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. Чтобы связать событие с обработчиком событий, нужно добавить в событие экземпляр делегата.To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. Обработчик событий вызывается всякий раз, когда происходит событие, если делегат не удален.The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. Дополнительные сведения о делегатах обработчиков событий см. в разделе [NIB: события и делегаты](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).For more information about event handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
